thread.title: Liverpool boss Jurgen Klopp slams his defence in shock 3-2 defeat at the hands of Swansea, saying Reds must react quickly
thread.title_full: Liverpool boss Jurgen Klopp slams his defence in shock 3-2 defeat at the hands of Swansea, saying Reds must react quickly

author: dfraser
title: Liverpool boss Jurgen Klopp slams his defence in shock 3-2 defeat at the hands of Swansea, saying Reds must react quickly
text:
EFL Jur awful Liverpool boss Jurgen Klopp slams his defence in shock 3-2 defeat at the hands of Swansea, saying Reds must react quickly 
Kop chief says back four were '100 per cent' not good enough, saying he can't even begin to explain the Swans' third goal By Dave Fraser
